function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid spread of COVID-19 due to unrestricted social activities","Impact":"Overwhelmed healthcare system, increased disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implement strict social distancing measures, enforce quarantine protocols","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, remote health monitoring","People":"General population, healthcare workers","Owner":"Government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Psychological impact of COVID-19 outbreak on mental health","Impact":"Increased stress, anxiety, depression, and suicidal behavior","Mitigation":"Provide mental health support services, accurate information, and community outreach","Technologies":"Telemedicine, mental health apps","People":"General population, frontline healthcare workers","Owner":"Mental health professionals, government"}]}
